abstract: Vermont regulators on Friday rejected a $2.7 billion plan by FairPoint Communications to buy Verizon‘s landlines in northern New England.
lead_paragraph: Vermont regulators on Friday rejected a $2.7 billion plan by FairPoint Communications to buy Verizon‘s landlines in northern New England.

headline.main: Vermont Reject FairPoint’s $2.7 Billon Bid for Verizon Lines
